metadata.name: Angel in the Backyard
metadata.description:
Once I saw an angel. She appeared to me in Minsk, my hometown, which I so rarely visit. She was a mother, a hard-worker, a carer. She was like my own mom, like my sisters. She exercised her love the way she was taught too early. 

"You're my angel", a man says, and she smiles. In the backyard of their apartment building, with dozens more of angels living in, she spreads the wings.

May 3, 2015, 11:33. Minsk, Belarus
Fujifilm X100S, 23mm, F/5.6, 1/350s, ISO 200
3788  x  2418 px
